description: Retrieves a list of resources, possibly filtered.

schema.description: OAuth 2 access token. Most APIs require `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube` scope. Google Auth / Service Account Token can be used to obtain a valid access token.
API key can be generated in Google Developer Console in APIs & Services section. Leave blank if OAuth access token is used.
The id of the live chat for which comments should be returned.
The *part* parameter specifies the liveChatComment resource parts that the API response will include. Supported values are id and snippet.
Specifies the localization language in which the system messages should be returned.
The *maxResults* parameter specifies the maximum number of items that should be returned in the result set.
The *pageToken* parameter identifies a specific page in the result set that should be returned. In an API response, the nextPageToken property identify other pages that could be retrieved.
Specifies the size of the profile image that should be returned for each user.
